about.heading: About Me
about.description1: Hello! I’m Rui Valim, a passionate Software and DevOps Engineer with almost a decade of experience in programming. My journey has taken me through various industries, including a significant tenure at Toyota, where I honed my skills in cloud computing and backend development. Currently, I’m contributing as a DevOps Engineer at NT Consult, working extensively with Kubernetes and Azure DevOps.
about.description2: I have extensive expertise in AWS, Azure, Kubernetes, Python, Typescript/Node.js, and DevOps practices. My strong background in backend development and cloud infrastructure allows me to build and manage complex systems efficiently.
about.description3: Apart from coding, I love capturing the world through my lens, and I’m excited to share my photography work here.
